mosinstall.name: Visitors Counter
mosinstall.author: DJesus
mosinstall.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License

param.name: hitsonly
param.label: Show Hits only
param.description: Display only the visitors Hits (no text)

param.name: style
param.label: Style
param.description: Set how the text will be located (left, center, right)

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre Text
param.description: Enter the text to write before the Hits.

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post Text
param.description: Enter the text to write after the Hits. If the [Pre] and [Post] fields are empty, the [_VISITORS] default value will be used in [Post]

param.name: increase
param.label: Increase counter
param.description: Enter the amount of hits to increase counter by

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling
